definition: the crime of forcing a woman to submit to sexual intercourse against her will, destroy and strip of its possession
details:
noun
- the crime of forcing a woman to submit to sexual intercourse against her will
= synonyms: violation
- the act of despoiling a country in warfare
= synonyms: rapine
- Eurasian plant cultivated for its seed and as a forage crop
= synonyms: colza
verb
- destroy and strip of its possession
= example: destroy and strip of its possession
= synonyms: spoil, plunder, despoil
- force someone to have sex against their will
= example: force someone to have sex against their will
= synonyms: outrage
